mapper.insert: insert into report (mno, target_mno, report_title, report_content) values (#{mno}, #{targetMno}, #{reportTitle}, #{reportContent})
mapper.select: select rpno, a.mno, target_mno, report_title, report_content, a.reg_at , m.nick_name, m2.nick_name as target_nick_name from report a inner join `member` m on a.mno = m.mno inner join `member` m2 on a.target_mno = m2.mno where rpno = #{rpno}

select a.rpno, b.mno, target_mno, report_title, b.reg_at , m.nick_name, m2.nick_name as target_nick_name from ( select rpno from report where rpno > 0 order by rpno limit #{pageStart}, #{qty} ) a left join report b on a.rpno = b.rpno inner join `member` m on b.mno = m.mno inner join `member` m2 on b.target_mno = m2.mno
